Alternate Title: Day of the Army of Africa and the colonial troops
Creator: Fouqueray, Charles, 1869-1956, artist
Description: Poster showing soldiers in various uniforms from Africa and the colonies, who fought for France.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
